message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your life.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about budget, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I have to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. Considering its value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $10500. This is a great compromise, and I believe it's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me at this price?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $10500. I'm willing to make one more compromise, though. I'll meet you at $10200. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $10000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, though. I'll meet you at $9900. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $9900, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget as far as I can. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to stretch your budget, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $10000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, though. I'll meet you at $9700. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
